page.title: 11EDUCATION-GAMES.
page.content: RED ROVER - This is a game for any number over 8 people. You form 2 teams. Each team joins hands and forms a line. Each team then in turn calls over someone by name from the opposing team, saying a verse like this: Red Rover, Red Rover. Send ....... right over. The person then tries to break the opposition team's line. If he or she does they return to their team, but if not he or she joins the team they could not break through. This continues until no one is left in one of the teams. CODE. Two groups take part. One group choses a word and gives each member a letter. They are chased by the other group who 'torture' them when caught by twisting their arms or pulling their hair to make them reveal their letter. This goes on until the other team guesses the word.
